website_summaries.verdict: If value and quality are more important to you than multiple color choices, check out other options available.
pros: Sports stainless steel frames and impact-resistant lenses for a very low price
Come with a 1-year guarantee on quality and available in various colors

customer_reviews.title: Nose pieces fall off easily!  This happened with 2 pairs!
customer_reviews.text: The nose piece fell off 2 pairs of these glasses almost immediately. I emailed to see if they could send me a new nose piece and instructions to repair but instead they sent me a coupon to buy another pair for a % off. No thanks... I sent one pair back... the other pair I kept because it had been over 30days.
customer_reviews.author: pepperTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: These have become my favoriate pair of sunglasses.
customer_reviews.text: I own several pair of sunglasses and these are at the top of the heap in regards to quality and comfort. The glass lens really make a difference in reducing distortion and improved clarity. I am pleasantly surprised that the glass lens do not add noticeable weight. They definitely are the most comfortable pair of sunglasses I own and appear to be a quality product. The reasonable price especially make this a value purchase. I may order another pair with a different lens color.
customer_reviews.author: ohioguy1

customer_reviews.title: Darker lenses than I anticipated!
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are a great value. They look great and feel great when wearing them. As a few other reviewers commented, the arms are a bit short and just BARELY go over my ears. It is a pretty snug fit. They could definitely be longer for a more comfortable fit. The lenses are also much darker than I expected. I haven't had the opportunity to wear them on a really sunny day as it's been overcast here for a few days. I'm hoping they aren't TOO dark. My eyes are sensitive to the light so I wear sunglasses even when overcast and these are a bit too dark for those conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Famous Amos

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of aviators!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these pair of glasses! I got the blue gradient one with black frame and it looks great! It has a sturdy feel. If anything that could be a small feedback, the tinted part is not that dark, so if it a really bright sunny day, you still have to squint your eyes when the sun is in your face. I'm overall satisfied though with them! It's my second pair so far and I would definitely get another!
customer_reviews.author: Raphael Mendez

customer_reviews.title: The frames are nice, feel solid and the glass is clear and ...
customer_reviews.text: Initial reaction is WOW! These are really impressive 30$ sunglasses. I have a genunine pair of RayBan 3025 58mm Brown gradient and these are exacting copies of them. We bought them for glasses to take with us in a Cruise, not to loose the RB. The frames are nice, feel solid and the glass is clear and looks as good in the house as the RayBans. The case is really excellent. Time will tell but for now I am most impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Better than raybans?
customer_reviews.text: I've owned 2 pairs of raybans. I must say these actually feel like higher quality. Especially the microfiber box it comes in to be stored for later too. The only problem I had was the nose piece was out too far for my nose. Simple fix by slight bends. But that's a personal problem. Everybody that has seen them has asked me where I got all this money to buy such expensive sun glasses. Little do they know these are $20 Haha. Highly recommend. You wont regret. I also wish they came in more colors. Wink wink O'LET ;)
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Moericke

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Ray Ban knockoff
customer_reviews.text: For a twenty dollars an issue, this fabulous RayBan knockoffs are an excellent product for the pricepoint . The clarity of the lense is superb, it appears to be well crafted with zero distortion that can be discern . It is much better in quality than I had anticipated. What I had in mind are convenient store quality sunglasses. Nothing could have been further from the truth. These sunglasses are solidly made and an excellent balance of value, quality and price.. The tacky brand logo is discreetly etched on the inside corner of the left lense.( Thanks Olet) I'm fairly easy with my sunglasses.If these pairs survives 3 months of daily regiment then I will probably purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Laveen

customer_reviews.title: Great metal and glass sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Great metal and glass sunglasses. I purchased the 70’s looking brown with gold frames. I needed to order the large frames knowing that I would have to request the larger 155 mm arms after the purchase. After getting the sunglasses, I emailed them. I immediately got a return email telling me how to order the replacements on Amazon. Got the arms in a couple of days. These fit great now! High quality and very comfortable. Enjoying them now in the Florida sunshine!
customer_reviews.author: Francis Head

customer_reviews.title: vastly better than my ray bans
customer_reviews.text: These are super sturdy and look good. The temples on the 58mm lens are only 135mm rather than the 140mm yu get with ray bans FYI. The seller sent new temples for free though so props to them. They don't say ray ban on them unfortunately but i'm not sure that's worth an extra $145 when my ray ban's are utter pieces of garbage. My ray ban's aren't polarized, have polycarbonate lenses that easily fall out, the metal is thin and cheap and they are made in china. Don't be an idiot like me: Boycott Luxoticrap
customer_reviews.author: Travis Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sunglasses I have ever had. I am able to see clearly through them which is very important to me while driving. Even with all the positive reviews, I was still amazed at how well they are made. And I don’t need to take them off in order to read. Great product. Just bought another pair of these great Sunglasses for the car
customer_reviews.author: K t jackman

customer_reviews.title: Better than Ray bans!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I anticipated them to be cheesy because of the price and just purchased them for lakes trips and places you expect them to be damaged at, but they are awesome!! They are a strong but not too heavy build. Very comfortable. I prefer them over my Ray bans now!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I go through and buy a lot of cheap 10-20$ sunglasses, when I received a notice from Amazon about these sunglasses regularly 70$ on sale for 18$ I decided to check it out and based on reviews I thought what the H, I'll give them a shot. I was very pleasantly surprised, heavy compared to my other cheap sunglasses (which is good in my opinion) sturdy, actual glass lens not plastic, cleans easy, no smearing or smudges, feel, wear, and look like expensive name brand sunglasses. If it stays close to the price I paid very well worth it, in fact I should go get another pair.
customer_reviews.author: eric a.

customer_reviews.title: Shaft/arm length lightly small
customer_reviews.text: The glasses looks sturdy and nice make but i feel the shaft/arm length is small. Could have been an inch or two longer to set on my face right. The nose brigde is too close that sometimes it ends on my forehead instead of fitting on my eyes. I tried to push back the nose bridge and could do only up to a limit. Not much choice of glass colour and frame colour. I usually do not prefer gold frame but for the glass colour and size of 55 that was the only option available. Would have been better if Silver colour and gradient dark brown are available. Regards. Hari.
customer_reviews.author: Hari.R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Petite Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: It's difficult to find aviator-style sunglasses sized for a petite female--these fit the need perfectly! The glasses are extremely well-made, quality metal and glass, and come with nice extra touches--a box, case, and cleaning cloth. I have purchased multiple pairs for my teen daughters and would even purchase as a gift item, they are that nice.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fabio

customer_reviews.title: I’ll purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: The frame of these glasses are really light but the eye glass itself is heavy so they want to slide off my nose. I wear prescription glasses so I’m used to resetting my glasses so it’s no big deal but please be aware. I really like the style of the gold and turtle shell so it looks good to me and they are wide enough to look good on my fat polish head. I’ll buy these again if they break or whatever. I like the case.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Oakheart

customer_reviews.title: Feel like $120 glasses
customer_reviews.text: Edit: at first I was really happy with these glasses, so much that I bought a second pair. Unfortunately neither pair has held up to any regular use. Both pairs nose pads snapped off which makes them unwearable. Classic case of you get what you pay for. Great quality for the $. Feels like high dollar glasses. The glass lenses are beautiful. My only complaint is they just aren't dark enough for really sunny days.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin James Churchill

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for 20$ feel more durable than Ray Ban
customer_reviews.text: Came nicely packaged, the lense cleaning cloth is not very good, too rough, nose pieces was all mashed together but no worries you can adjust them to fit your face, probably would not want to bend them to much may snap off frame, they don’t look expensive BUT they don’t look cheap, the ear stems come a little shorter than most other aviators I have, to be honest the lense clarity and quality is OK, but that is what you get for 20 bucks, I just bought them to goof around outside, mowing yard and ect, hope my photos help!
customer_reviews.author: calico_1989

customer_reviews.title: Nose pad broke off on 2 pairs-no customer service response
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these sunglasses, they felt and looked like great quality glasses. I liked them so much I bought a new pair after my first pair broke after about a year, only to have the same thing happen to be second pair only a few months after buying. In both cases, the nose pad broke off, rendering them unusable. I am extremely careful with my sunglasses so it was not due to care. I tried to contact customer service and I got an email from amazon saying that their email is not deliverable, but that they will still get message via Amazon. I have yet to hear anything, so it appears the so called guarantee is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Mom3Grlz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value & Design
customer_reviews.text: Real glass!!! It is so rare with sunglasses under $100 to use real glass lens. There are a few but the glass is soooo thin that I would be nervous to wear them due to safety reasons. This pair is the classic aviator design. It's not as large as some of the cheap convenience store types, and that is a good thing. I personally wear a large hat size and these fit my face perfectly. I wish they had a design that used another color tint. I'd definitely purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: R.L.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These are much nicer than I was expecting. They are clearly well made, attractive, and they come in a very nice case with a nice cleaning cloth. I'm surprised these weren't far more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Melges-Brenner

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the glasses
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these glasses, and have bought four pairs. The first pair I bought, these ones, came with a MUCH cooler case than the others I bought. I would be WAY happier if they all came with the same great case as my first pair.
customer_reviews.author: Meanjoe4202

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear this pair of sunglasses everyday for the past 6 month after I lost my favorite pair of ray bans. To my surprise the quality of O-Let is on par with my previous pair. I have gone on lakes, ATV off-roading and sub zero temperatures with this pair of sunglasses and it perform extremely well. Dropped it a few times on concrete and asphalt there's barely any scratch on the lens. The only problem I have with this pair is the arm came loose over time, but tightening it up makes it good as new!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lin

customer_reviews.title: Nose rests too long
customer_reviews.text: Nose rests are too long. Glasses stand off nose, too high and there is no good way to adjust without stressing the metal. I did not expect the nose rests to not be flush with the lenses. Maybe just my tastes but glasses stood so far away from my face the idea of these reducing any sun glare became an impossibility. Back they go!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

customer_reviews.title: and while they're not polarised they are amazing. The build is nice
customer_reviews.text: Lost my ray-ban aviators, and could not justify another $200 purchase. Did some research on these, and while they're not polarised they are amazing. The build is nice, the lenses are great. I absolutly love them, and would never buy ray-ban again, if anything is buy their glass/polarised glasses that are $60.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I am soooooo happy with these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I am soooooo happy with these glasses!!! Move over Ray-Ban!!! I had just bought a pair of Ray-Bans and was really not happy with them. I decided to give O-Let a shot and let me tell you, I could not be happier! Thank you for making an excellent product that is affordable!!! One thing about sizing: I have a small face and the 58mm fit me pretty well. I probably could do the 55mm as well. I'm so happy with these that I'm going to buy them in every color!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Looking for something beside easily scratched plastic glasses for general daily use. Lens quality good and they fit well. Only downside I see is the frames are rather anemic, however they function without issue so I guess time will show durability.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Welch

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: I paid <$20 for my pair, and they were worth it. They are nearly identical to my Ray Bans, just minor detail differences. I'm quite happy with them, they are much nicer than drug store glasses, without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this exclusively for motorcycle riding given that I have a tendency to lost expensive sunglasses. Couldn’t be any happier. I used them with a TORC Full face helmet. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jose M.

customer_reviews.title: Nose piece broke within a few weeks even with careful handling
customer_reviews.text: I hate scratched lenses so I take good care of my glasses. These broke soon after I got them but I missed the return window because, you know, life gets busy. Hope my review saves you from the same mishap!
customer_reviews.author: JenEm

customer_reviews.title: Identical to RB's
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly identical to the RB's I spent hundreds of dollars on over the years. Solidly put together, gold frames and glass lenses. I could not tell the difference except for the absence of a logo and at 1/8th the price. I'm buying more for family.
customer_reviews.author: Worshipguitar

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Ray Ban aviators for decades and found that the quality and customer service is not what it used to be. These O-Let glasses are great quality, glass lens and the finish seems to hold up well, you will be impressed.
customer_reviews.author: TAD

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised about the quality. I read a lot of good reviews, but I still was doubtful. When I saw them in person I was pleasantly surprised. They feel sturdy and of very good quality. I am used to buying "stainless steel" but are always some type of cheap metal. I am allergic to nickel and I have had not had one allergic reaction yet. I am very happy with these glasses. They are beautiful and of good quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses and the price is right! The lenses are glass and help my my sight to be crystal clear. The case is sturdy and protective when not wearing the glasses.
customer_reviews.author: NC MOUNTAINS

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Pleasant to Wear!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable sunglasses, sturdy and clear most of the time, shades well against the sun! Price is reasonable! Comfortable to wear!
customer_reviews.author: Tony PI

customer_reviews.title: Look pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: My nose pad fell off after maybe 60 days and I don’t know where to get a replacement. Not happy about that. If seller would fix this I would consider changing to 4 stars. I would recommend the larger size option frame for men also.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very good glasses
customer_reviews.text: This glasses look well made. They are as described in the information. The case is also well made. The logo is printed from inside the glass so it doesn't jump out as RayBan logo. A quality product at a very affordable price. I wish it were a polarized. Apart from that, these are very good glasses.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but..
customer_reviews.text: The polarization works very well. They are comfortable, metallic and of good design. They arrived a bit mistreated. The bases of the nose twisted and the glasses very flattened.
customer_reviews.author: Federico

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Even though it looks cheap and it has additional shine on its frame, the glass is amazing as its a crystal glass lens. Good for the money paid.
customer_reviews.author: Renjith R Pillai

customer_reviews.title: Impressive quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed by the quality for the price. The frames, while on the thin side, still feel sturdy. The glass is nice and clear - no blemishes or scratches. The case is surprisingly heavy duty and it comes with a cleaning cloth and extra nose pads, as well. I bought the 62mm size and they fit my larger face very well. I'd absolutely recommend these and I'm actually looking into getting a polarized pair as well. Best bang for the buck I've found on aviators so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jowiso

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and real glass
customer_reviews.text: I was going to say, "for the price" but price does not make the product. These are as good as a pair of Ray Ban glasses that I paid a whole bunch more for. Just got them yesterday and ordered another pair today.
customer_reviews.author: Anchovy

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price for real glass
customer_reviews.text: Good sunglasses. Definitely buy these instead of overpriced Raybans. I bought the gunmetal grey frames with blue gradient lenses. They look very good and are clear. The lenses for this model are pretty light so if you really like darker shades I would recommend a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Saul Goodman

customer_reviews.title: The glasses are great. I feel that they are very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are great. I feel that they are very sturdy, and put together well. In addition, the earpiece was too short, so I contacted the seller. They responded quickly, sent me a new pair of earpieces within a week for free, along with a tool kit. Great customer service. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Enrico C. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses, wonderful fit, and excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: great value and product. These fit really well, and work great. I have went through a lot of name brand sunglasses, Kate Spade, Steve Madden, etc... and they don't fit as well as these. For less than the cost I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Rapson

customer_reviews.title: The quality is no that great.
customer_reviews.text: The frames feel cheap. Not comfortable. The sizes are off. The medium size is too small and larger size is too big. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Nice looking Aviators"
customer_reviews.text: Loved the presentation. Good UV protection. I need a little more width in the frame. Otherwise nice Aviators!
customer_reviews.author: Maya J

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses. Usually purchase Ray Ban Aviators because I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Sunglasses. Usually purchase Ray Ban Aviators because I prefer “Glass” lenses. These are at least as good as the Ray Ban glasses if not better. Ordered one pair. After trying them out, I ordered another pair for backups.
customer_reviews.author: Rick P.

customer_reviews.title: These sunglasses are the perfect shade, especially if you like blue and silver
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are the perfect shade, especially if you like blue and silver. They also provide great protection from the sun and form fit to your face better than any I have tried before.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Baird

customer_reviews.title: great value for the price !
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses were exactly as advertized. They are reasonably priced and come with a nice case and lens cleaner. Because of the measuement information in the listing they fit as expected and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Will purchase again and again
customer_reviews.text: I got this pair before from the same brand and ended up dropping them and stepping on them. I loved them so much that this is my second pair. Will buy again if I end up buying the new pair
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Other glasses I've had with the same stated sizes fit perfectly, but these were way too small.
customer_reviews.author: OCDShopper

customer_reviews.title: Broken nose piece after two wears
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for my best friend. She informed me that she’s only worn them twice and the nose piece fell off already!! What do I need to do to get a replacement?? Can’t believe this has happened..kinda embarrassing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce J. Oehrlein

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, clear lens
customer_reviews.text: These are very good quality for the price with much clearer lens than plastic ones. The frames are as good as frames costing much more.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Moriarty

customer_reviews.title: Good for the golfer types
customer_reviews.text: Wear these when playing golf. Very good for that purpose....takes glare away, and they are not so dark they take away from the ability to read greens....
customer_reviews.author: Fran M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small heads
customer_reviews.text: At first I gasped because I thought these were way to small, but for my petite face, they were just right. For the value, they're perfect. The only issue is that the free case is too feminine to keep in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Nose piece broke
customer_reviews.text: The nose piece did not adjust to the size of my nose. When attempting to adjust it, the piece came off. I was unable to get a new pair that fit me. I usually do not have trouble with the nose piece on glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Had them for one year now.. I break everything and they are still goin strong! Haven’t scratched at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Nygard

customer_reviews.title: NOT POLARIZED
customer_reviews.text: Description really should explicitly state that the lenses are not polarized, as most other brands do. A bit misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Just like Ray-Bans!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses look exactly like Ray-Ban aviators! They seem to be well made. The case that comes with them is not the leather one pictured on Amazon. But I do like the case it comes with, though I wish it was nylon and black. They seem like a very good deal for the money, would be better if they were polarized. But overall a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Chicago

customer_reviews.title: This is the one..
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive, but not cheap aviators. These are them. Glass lenses, solid feel. Overall, exactly what I wanted. 4 stars for out of the box the nose piece fell off. Not a good start. I pinched it back on. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect. Well made and feel heavy in the hand
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for sunglasses for my teenage sons. Knowing that the life expectancy of anything given to a teenage boy is measured in days, not years, I didn't want to splurge for heirloom quality shades. These are perfect. Well made and feel heavy in the hand. Love the UV protection and scratch resistant lenses. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great $20 sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Second pair I’ve bought, overall happy with the product, however, both pairs lost an eyelet fairly quickly. Wish that wouldn’t have happened twice. Don’t think I’ll buy a third pair.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Nice sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Sunglasses were nice, but decided to return since I did not like how they looked.
customer_reviews.author: Karen G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Fit perfectly! Don't fall off or feel like they are falling off your ears. Price is great! I think I will buy another pair for back up! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jones

customer_reviews.title: I have a hard time with sunglasses because I have a small face - so it is great they come in different sizes
customer_reviews.text: I wear these ALL THE TIME! I have a hard time with sunglasses because I have a small face - so it is great they come in different sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Michalek

customer_reviews.title: Broke during first use
customer_reviews.text: A nose piece of the glasses snapped off within minutes of wearing these on. Very cheap material, they are worth a quarter of the sale price.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these sunglasses. A bit smaller than I am used to so cannot wear on my head when inside. Probably for the best as I will not stretch them out! Good quality materials used.
customer_reviews.author: S. Houston

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses...
customer_reviews.text: way better than what I was expecting... You will not be disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are much better than I expected. They are high quality and look great on. I am a female with an average size face and the mediums fit perfectly and are very comfortable. I loved that there are numerous frame and lense selections. I purchased silver on silver; I will be purchasing another color in the future.
customer_reviews.author: RachelOK

customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT 2ND PAIR TO HAVE RX LENSES PUT IN FOR DRIVEN SUN GLASSES LOVE THEM PS IVE ALWAYS WHORE RAY BANS FOR THE PAST 35 YEARS NO MORE THANKXXX
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT P.

customer_reviews.title: Great style & fit
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality and the style of these glasses. It is also shipped in a nice container. For the first time, I was able to find a size that fit my face well. Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jen L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love them. I was hoping they were a little darker blue. But it's fine. Other than that they are great. Fit is perfect and they look great. The shipping was on point. Great service. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great and affordable
customer_reviews.text: got these for a costume and ended up wearing them myself after. They feel great and look like a high end quality pair of glasses
customer_reviews.author: Missie E

customer_reviews.title: Quality and fit of RayBans at a much better price
customer_reviews.text: Quality and fit of RayBans at a much better price. Got these as a gift for my wife and she loves them. When she lost the first pair, we ordered a second.
customer_reviews.author: whiterockron

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Omg what can I say about these wonderful shades they are wonderful very sturdy and comfortable and....nice looking wow..
customer_reviews.author: robert Bookman

customer_reviews.title: Best looking glasses in the price range!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sunglasses. I lost them recently and tried to re-oder but O-Let is out of stock. They fit well and aren't too big for my face! Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These glasses are AMAZING. Very stylish
customer_reviews.text: OMG, These glasses are AMAZING. Very stylish, comfortable, made very well. For the price, you cannot get better. I'll definitely be ordering more!! I ordered an expensive pair of Maui Jim's to the tune of 250.00 and sent them back! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice n' small!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for us petite gals! They seem sturdy and tight and the tint is a great shade of gray.
customer_reviews.author: melinurse

customer_reviews.title: they resist scratches as well as my raybans
customer_reviews.text: the quality is great!!! and they don't get scratches like most inexpensive brands
customer_reviews.author: Rob M.

customer_reviews.title: awesome sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Not only are they beautiful, but they are beautifully made. Great quality......incredible price
customer_reviews.author: Belkis

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not what it was hyped up to be. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: Aviator or Driving
customer_reviews.text: No distortions in the lens that I can see.Glasses,I feel,most usefull as driving glasses.
customer_reviews.author: andironcounty

customer_reviews.title: Nice first impression
customer_reviews.text: First impression is good. Nose pads were all bent but hopefully didn’t get soft after adjusting. Will test soon update to come
customer_reviews.author: Yes

customer_reviews.title: Great overall
customer_reviews.text: Material quality on bar for what you paid and don’t expect RayBan quality here
customer_reviews.author: Amro M Sharaf

customer_reviews.title: Nice sun glasses for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad sunglasses for the price. Look like ray bans. Durable. I'd order again.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Upset that they broke so quickly
customer_reviews.text: Nose piece fell off after wearing these about 10 times. Really upset because I LOVED these. They fit well and I thought they were good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joan A Betancourt

customer_reviews.title: the glass sunglasses are what is needed, as the ...
customer_reviews.text: the glass sunglasses are what is needed, as the plastic wears when in a pocket. Also as a pilot, polarized is not useable as the instruments cannot be read with polarized glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Del

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: These are nice shades. Might be a little flimsy but for the price, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Karen C. Lheureux

customer_reviews.title: No glare
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses, especially that I don’t have the glare when the sun hits between my face and the lens.
customer_reviews.author: gogadawg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks like some Ray Bans.. Have gotten a lot of compliments for them
customer_reviews.author: Go Canes!

customer_reviews.title: Na
customer_reviews.text: They fit well- they don’t slide down on face. real nice product.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. 2nd pair I bought. The first time I ordered adults and they were too large. The children’s fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses for the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great aviators for the price! They are light and the lenses are nice. They come in a very nice case with a cleaning cloth and extra nose bridges. Very happy with the order and plan to buy another!!!
customer_reviews.author: B-RI

customer_reviews.title: They look and feel like quality "brand" glasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son. And he LOVES them. They look and feel like quality "brand" glasses, but priced nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Zaun

customer_reviews.title: I like these a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot, glad I got them. I didn't want to spend a ton on Ray Bans as I use sunglasses pretty infrequently. The smaller size is a great fit for my face and I like the tint compared to darker/grayish tints.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: They came with a couple of days and I love them! They come with a glasses case and a cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Fire up my F-22 , would you ?
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are equivalent to Ray-Bans. My problem now is deciding whether to get polarized lenses on my next pair. I really don't see that there is room for much improvement. Any thoughts on that choice out there?
customer_reviews.author: joel partain

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: I think these are better than Ray-Ban , or just like it , love em.
customer_reviews.author: SHARKY

customer_reviews.title: Works for an alan grant cosplay
customer_reviews.text: i use these everyday in Florida and they work great and look awesome as well
customer_reviews.author: andrew cross

customer_reviews.title: I loved them so got another pair
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of O-Let Aviators. I dropped the first pair and the glass broke. I loved them so got another pair. A quality product I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cortez J.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking glasses for an amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for my husband. They arrived as described and with a nice case. They look nice and he likes them, mission accomplished.
customer_reviews.author: Mel1075

4. PERFECT GIFT: These aviator sunglasses for women men is presented to you in a nice sunglasses case ¨C For Christmas, Birthdays, Anniversaries, Graduation and Father's Day. You can easily gift it to that special someone on that special day.
